de.ralleytn.simple.audio

Class StreamedAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.AbstractAudio
      • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.StreamedAudio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Audio, Playable

    public class StreamedAudio
extends AbstractAudio
    Never loads the entire audio data into the RAM. Good for music and long audio.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Field Summary
